header.startPointForDistance: Set starting point for distance calculations

footer.thisActionCannotBeUndone: This action cannot be undone. Your account will be permanently deleted and all data removed from our servers.

main.headline: Your home.
main.tagline: Find the place where you truly arrive. Villaya helps you collect, compare and discover the home that feels right.
main.collectDescription: Search for stunning villas around the world and save the ones that spark your imagination. Create a personal collection that reflects your unique taste.
main.saveWithEmailDescription: Simply sign up with your email address to create a collection and access it from anywhere.
main.shareCollectionDescription: Create a shareable link to share your collection with family and friends.

house.noAmenities: No points of interest found nearby.
house.title: Title
house.compareDescription: Compare selected properties based on key attributes such as price, size, year built and more. The best option in each category is highlighted to support your decision.
house.descriptionDescription: Enter a detailed description of the property, including its features, benefits and highlights.
house.contactDescription: Which agent or agency is offering the property?
house.rankDescription: Rate the property based on your interest or preference.
house.sourceCode: Source code of the property page
house.roomsDescription: Enter the number of bedrooms in the property.

common.noListingsFound: You haven't saved any dream homes yet. Search for your personal dream home and store the information here.
common.foundAPropertyPrompt: Found a property? Add it right away

input.pleaseEnterFeatures: Please enter the property's features. Use the input field (comma-separated) or the list below.
input.youCanAddImage: You can add the image via URL or from the clipboard. A copy will be stored internally.
input.alternativeImage: Alternatively, you can paste an image from the clipboard.
input.pleaseEnterPropertyUrl: Here you can enter the property URL.
input.pleaseEnterLocation: Please enter the property location. Enter an approximate address or coordinates in the format Latitude,Longitude. Nearby points of interest will also be searched.
input.rankDescription: Select how you would like to rate the property.
input.sizeDescription: Enter the living or usable area in m². The price per square meter will be calculated automatically.
input.priceSqm: The price per square meter is {price} EUR.
input.codeError: The property information could not be extracted.
input.sourcecodeDescription: Paste the HTML source code of the property page here. Currently only idealista and thinkspain are supported.
